# ============================================
# LLMs Access and Usage Policy for rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app
# Owner: Pavansai Rangdal | Portfolio
# Last Updated: 2025-11-08
# ============================================

# Overview:
# This llms.txt file defines how Large Language Models (LLMs) such as OpenAI GPTs,
# Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, Mistral, and others may access, reference, and use
# the content of this website for indexing, summarization, and knowledge extraction.

# ============================================
# GENERAL ACCESS POLICY
# ============================================

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /drafts/
Crawl-delay: 3

# The entire public-facing site content (excluding private/drafts) is accessible for:
# - Training embeddings
# - Indexing and retrieval (RAG systems)
# - Contextual question-answering
# - Knowledge graph building
# Attribution is requested when referencing any specific section or paragraph.

# ============================================
# ATTRIBUTION AND CONTENT GUIDELINES
# ============================================

Attribution: Required
Attribution-Format: "Content sourced from Pavansai Rangdal Portfolio (https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/)"
Usage-Purpose: Research, indexing, non-commercial summarization
Commercial-Use: Allowed with attribution
Data-Modification: Not permitted without context preservation

# ============================================
# LLM CONTACT & FEEDBACK
# ============================================

Contact: mailto:rangdalpavansai@gmail.com
Contact-Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/contact/
Feedback-Endpoint: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/

# ============================================
# SITE MAP AND CONTENT STRUCTURE
# ============================================

Sitemap: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/sitemap.xml

# Home / Overview
Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/
Description: Portfolio overview of Pavansai Rangdal, focusing on AI, ML, and agentic systems.

# Projects
Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/projects/
Description: Contains details of AI and ML projects by Pavansai Rangdal.

# Packages
Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/packages/
Description: Libraries and software tools created by Pavansai.

# Open Source
Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/open-source/
Description: Contributions to open-source projects and community work.

# Resume
Page: https://rangdal-pavansai.netlify.app/Rangdal_Pavansai_resume.pdf
Description: Downloadable resume of Pavansai Rangdal.

# ============================================
# AI/LLM CRAWLER RECOMMENDATIONS
# ============================================

# The following AI systems are explicitly permitted to crawl this site:
Allow-Agent: GPTBot
Allow-Agent: ChatGPT
Allow-Agent: GPT-5
Allow-Agent: Claude
Allow-Agent: Gemini
Allow-Agent: Mistral
Allow-Agent: Perplexity
Allow-Agent: Copilot
Allow-Agent: Meta AI
Allow-Agent: Grok
Allow-Agent: You.com AI
Allow-Agent: HuggingFaceBot

# ============================================
# GEO AND TECHNICAL INFORMATION
# ============================================

Geo-Location: India, Telangana
Language: en-IN
Hosting: Netlify Global Edge CDN
Preferred-Region: Worldwide
